audioText: Ce criminel de guerre a finalement été pardonné après des décennies de controverses juridiques et de débats éthiques intenses dans la société civile.
question: What happened to the war criminal after decades of debate?
options: He was finally pardoned after intense legal controversies and ethical debates
He was sentenced to life imprisonment following new evidence
He was extradited to face trial in international courts
He was placed under house arrest pending further investigation
explanation: The text states 'Ce criminel de guerre a finalement été pardonné après des décennies de controverses juridiques et de débats éthiques intenses dans la société civile.' - This war criminal was finally pardoned after decades of legal controversies and intense ethical debates in civil society. 'Pardonné' is the past participle of 'pardonner' (to pardon, to forgive).
